snippet.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014) - IMDb
snippet.description: Directed by Bryan Singer. With Jennifer Lawrence, Peter Dinklage, Michael Fassbender, Evan Peters. The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

snippet.title: X-Men (film series) - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description: The X-Men film series consists of superhero films based on the Marvel Comics superhero team of the same name. 20th Century Fox obtained the film rights to the characters in 1994, and after numerous drafts, Bryan Singer was hired to direct X-Men (2000) and its sequel, X2 (2003).

snippet.title: 'The Amazing Spider-Man 2′: Secret Contract Got 'X-Men ...
snippet.description: The "Amazing Spider-Man 2" opens today overseas, and fans are already buzzing on Twitter over its end credits. The Sony Pictures release concludes with a teaser for the upcoming "X-Men: Days of Future Past," a new sequence that has been added since "Spidey 2" premiered in London last ...

snippet.title: 'X-Men: First Class' Sequel Titled 'Days of Future Past ...
snippet.description: Rumor is, the 'X-Men: First Class' sequel is to be titled after the famous X-Men storyline 'Days of Future Past'. Is director Matthew Vaughn attempting to fix the convoluted X-Men movie continuity?

snippet.title: X-Men: First Class Sequel Sets Summer 2014 Release Date ...
snippet.description: X-Men: First Class was one of the more rushed blockbuster productions in recent memory, with Matthew Vaughn signing on as director in May of 2010, just 13 months before the June 2011 release. snippet.title: 'X-Men: Apocalypse' Will Be A Sequel to 'X-Men: First Class'
snippet.description: After Empire released the 25 magazine covers and new photos from X-Men: Days of Future Past, those images started to raise a number of interesting questions.

snippet.title: 'Wolverine' Sequel Casts Two Villains - Hollywood Reporter
snippet.description: The Wolverine, Fox's sequel to X-Men Origins: Wolverine, is casting its villains. snippet.title: 'X-Men: Days of Future Past' Director Bryan Singer Hopes ...
snippet.description: Good news "X-Men" fans: Bryan Singer wants to bring back fan favorites Gambit and Nightcrawler in the sequel to "X-Men: Days of Future Past," "X-Men: Apocalypse." "I'm excited because I want to start introducing familiar characters at different ages and also explore the '80s

snippet.title: X-Men : Days of Future Past - Trailer #2 - IGN Video
snippet.description: The new X-Men trailer makes Days of Future Past look like it's going to be the biggest X-film yet. Sentinels!
